00075 namespace ckBasicType
00076 {
00077     typedef signed char s8; 
00078     typedef signed short s16; 
00079     typedef signed int s32; 
00080 
00081     typedef unsigned char u8; 
00082     typedef unsigned short u16; 
00083     typedef unsigned int u32; 
00084 
00085     typedef float r32; 
00086     typedef double r64; 
00087 
00088 #if defined(__GNUC__)
00089     typedef signed long long s64; 
00090     typedef unsigned long long u64; 
00091 #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
00092     typedef signed __int64 s64; 
00093     typedef unsigned __int64 u64; 
00094 #else
00095 #error
00096 #endif
00097 }

00113 class ckException
00114 {
00115 public:
00122     ckException(const char* exception, const char* file, u32 line)
00123     {
00124         m_exception = exception;
00125         m_file = file;
00126         m_line = line;
00127     }
00128 
00133     const char* getException() const
00134     {
00135         return m_exception;
00136     }
00137 
00142     const char* getFile() const
00143     {
00144         return m_file;
00145     }
00146 
00151     u32 getLine() const
00152     {
00153         return m_line;
00154     }
00155 
00156 private:
00157     const char* m_exception;
00158     const char* m_file;
00159     u32 m_line;
00160 };

00163 #ifdef CK_NO_THROW_EXCEPTION
00164 
00165 CK_API void ckSubstituteThrow(const char* exception, const char* file, u32 line);
00166 
00167 #define ckDefineException(e)
00168 #define ckTry if (true)
00169 #define ckThrow(e) ckSubstituteThrow(#e, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00170 #define ckCatch(...) if (false)
00171 
00172 #else
00173 
00179 #define ckDefineException(e) \
00180     class e : public ckException \
00181     { \
00182     public: \
00183         e(const char* exception, const char* file, u32 line) : ckException(exception, file, line) {} \
00184     }
00185 
00186 
00191 #define ckTry try
00192 
00193 
00199 #define ckThrow(e) throw e(#e, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00200 
00201 
00207 #define ckCatch(...) catch (__VA_ARGS__)
00208 
00209 #endif // CK_NO_THROW_EXCEPTION
